ErrHandler Class Reference

#include <ErrHandler.h>

Inheritance diagram for ErrHandler:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual ~ErrHandler ()
virtual void handleError (const std::string &msg)=0

Detailed Description

Abstract base class (aka interface) for handling errors that come from Err::errAbort(). Write a class inheriting from ErrHandler and push it onto the handler stack via Err::pushErrHandler().
